document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Fate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">slew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">drop </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">felled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">fall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Impaled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">fiercest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">stakes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">neutralized </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">stung </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">sapped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">firm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Advance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Worst </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">unmoved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">regarded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Acknowledged </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Man </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Fate slew him but he did not drop
